command.name: ro.problems.data.get-all-available-actions
command.script: select cet.complex_type source_entity_complex_type ,a.action ,a.name action_name ,a.params action_params ,at.type action_type , atg.target action_target , ut.type user_type , et.type target_entity_type , cet2.complex_type target_entity_complex_type , acts.allow_read_to_all from action_strategies acts ,actions a ,action_types at ,user_types ut ,action_targets atg ,entity_types et ,complex_entity_type cet ,complex_entity_type cet2 where acts.complex_entity_type_id=cet.id and acts.action_id=a.id and a.action_type_id=at.id and acts.user_type_id = ut.id and acts.action_target_id=atg.id and acts.entity_type_id=et.id and acts.target_entity_complex_type_id=cet2.id order by acts.complex_entity_type_id,acts.order_index
